text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly addresses the connection test under point 2: \"The counterclaim must have a sufficient connection to the investor's original claim. This is often assessed on a case-by-case basis, but generally, the counterclaim should arise out of the same facts or circumstances as the investor's claim.\" This aligns directly with the criterion requiring an explanation of the connection test, specifically that counterclaims must arise out of the same investment/transaction or share a close factual nexus with the investor\u2019s claims.", "criterion_id": "cd01ecfc-f099-45f9-9f56-ede0fb8737cb"}
